snippet: Yasiel Puig had hit .171 (6 for 35) in his past nine games, dropping his average to .351 from .379.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Los Angeles Dodgers outfielder Yasiel Puig breaks out of slump with lead-off home run in team's 6-4 victory over Miami Marlins; other MLB scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Yasiel Puig had hit .171 (6 for 35) in his past nine games, dropping his average to .351 from .379.

headline.main: Benched During Slump, Dodgers’ Puig Snaps Out With a Crucial Homer
headline.print_headline: Benched During Slump, Dodgers’ Puig Snaps Out With a Crucial Homer
